name: Twisty Dance- Music Ball Games
description:
Are you a fan of arcade music game?
This new music game will bring you +14 best voted electronica music with high focus on rhythm and beats

Travel above the endless tube but not to hit obstacles… Try to focus the rhythm and feel the beats

*Remember all those gems are your rhythmic beats, so you don’t ever wanna miss any, do you?*



1. ONE FINGER CONTROL, BUT WILL YOU SURVIVE?
Slide around the tube to collect beats and avoid obstacles. Make your own way thru the half-open walls… Sounds easy but 8 out of 10 could not finish the first song!

2. 6-SPEED CHALLENGE
Sit tight, hold your breath, cause speed is increasing deadly, time after time... Let's see how max speed can you go up to?

3. ELECTRONIC MUSIC, SO ADDICTIVE!
Many hit music file for you to unlock
For the best experience play with headphones and full volume

4. AMAZING 3D GRAPHICS, HOW COOL!
Minimal 3D graphic sure make you happy with amazing design yet catchy and trendy
